alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Glades; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Inland Palm Beach County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 9:20PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Collier, northern Mainland Monroe, northern Miami-Dade, Hendry, Broward, western Palm Beach and south central Glades Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 920 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake Harbor to 7 miles south of Loop Road Ee Center. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Belle Glade, Clewiston, Pahokee, South Bay, Moore Haven, Chokoloskee, Canal Point, Lake Harbor, Montura, Everglades City, Plantation Island, Loop Road Ee Center, Carnestown, Belle Glade Camp, Copeland, Wilderness Waterway, Hendry Correctional, Holey Land Wildlife Refuge, Everglades National Park and Big Cypress National Preserve. LIGHTNING...EXCESSIVE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
